::Suka::

Suka nods. "Allright. I'll get to it."

He turns around and 'walks' back to the door, kicking at it several times to get it to open and 'walking' out.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> President Kaiser:
> 
> 
> 
> Kaiser looked to the organic, with hidden contempt for him, like he had for 
> almost every organic. 
> 
>  "Vice-President Suka, we are nearing the third planet of this repulsive 
> solar system, Earth, except int he past.  Make sure the civilian areas are 
> secured with IGL soldiers before we arrive.  There are anti-IGL terrorist 
> cells still in the civilian areas, despite our attempts to eradicate them.  
> Also have our top engineers look over the ships systems, every circuit.  When 
> we get to this...Past Earth...no doubt there are some nasty characters afoot 
> that may want our technology.  We can't allow that.  Then if there is still 
> time, have as many volunteers as possible get into space suits, if needed, 
> and help polish the outside of the Otyebis.  We want to impress those 
> Cybertronians on Earth."
